meanings.definition: To carry out or perform again
meanings.sent1: He reexecutes the experiment to ensure accurate results.
meanings.sent2: The software reexecutes the command after an error occurs.
meanings.sent3: The magician reexecutes the trick, leaving the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: The athlete reexecutes his winning move, securing another victory.
meanings.sent5: She reexecutes the recipe, hoping for a better outcome this time.

meanings.sent1: The system reexecutes the code to fix the bug.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reexecutes the lesson for students who missed it.
meanings.sent3: The chef reexecutes the dish, adding a new twist to it.
meanings.sent4: The artist reexecutes the painting, enhancing its beauty.
meanings.sent5: He reexecutes the presentation to make it more engaging.
